title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
description: What an adventure this takes you on! Indiana Jones takes on Nazis in the desert to stop them from finding the Ark of the Covenant.  It is a face-melting good movie.

title: Dodgeball
description: 'If you can dodge a wrench, you can dodge a ball.' Absolute classic

title: Jurassic Park
description: The original, a masterpiece of epic proportions
